Girgis' Algorithm 
=================

- **girgis** module that implements locally differentially private mean estimation algorithms proposed by Girgis. This method includes Hadamard-based range-localization, per-user Laplace mechanisms for mean privatization, and aggregation utilities for both scalar and multivariate inputs.
- **girgis.scalar** provides locally private range and mean estimation algorithms for 1-dimensional (scalar) data.
- **girgis.multivariate** extends the same mechanisms to handle multi-dimensional (vector) data.
